author: Kerry Pieri
title: 10 Best Dressed Celebrities on the 2017 SAG Awards Red Carpet - Best Dressed Celebrities at SAG Awards
text:
Why: A little whimsy and couture shapes add up to an unforgettable statement. PHOTO: Getty 
Who: Claire Foy 
What: Valentino 
Why: There's always room for a little romanticismâ€”done up in sheer, pink and floral appliques. PHOTO: Getty 
Who: Emma Stone 
What: Alexander McQueen 
Why: Sweet and sultry come together in a gown that melds lace, ruffles and a floral print perfectly. PHOTO: Getty 
Who: Sophie Turner 
What: Louis Vuitton 
Why: Turner has never looked better, donning an architectural red dress that's meant to do anything but blend in. 
Who: Evan Rachel Wood 
Why: Wood is proving fashion and feminism make for ideal red carpet mates. 
Who: Brie Larson 
Why: A simple cut on white is a winning combination. The SAG Awards 10 best dressed 
Win or lose, these 10 ladies stole the show Updated: 1:07 PM EST Jan 30, 2017 Share
